attributes.additional_details: Because I dont want to contract or pass on covid 19
attributes.background: I would like dvsa to close mot testing service during covid 19 so all garages and staff can stay at home as requested

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced that if a vehicle MOT due date expires from 30 March 2020 it will be extended by 6 months

Garages can still open for essential repairs or services. Find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-mot-centre-and-tester-guidance

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
